ComicInfo.Summary:
Part 2 of a 4-part story! Nature continues to go wild in the heart of the world's most densely populated areas. New York, Chicago and Paris all have fallen prey to unexpected disasters. Earth's shaman, The Doctor , is the one man who might be able to save the world...but he's fighting for his life after a heroin overdose.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2023-10-19 07:40:01. [CVDB53636]
